content:
/>
VIII.iv.6.B.4.d
.
1151 Disability Resulting From Error in Judgment
Error in judgment, as used in
38 U.S.C. 1151
, refers to errors involving negligence and does not encompass reasonable decisions regarding diagnosis and treatment merely because they later prove to have been incorrect.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 6, Section B - Rating Claims Filed Under 38 U.S.C. 1151
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 6, Section B
